Replace.Text: Layla, Layla [NewLine] You have to work harder
Layla, Layla[NewLine] You have worked hard[NewLine] But your knowledge is not comprehensive enough

Layla, Layla[NewLine] You are diligent and knowledgeable in your studies[NewLine] That’s good[NewLine] But you must not relax[NewLine] If you slack off for a while, you will fall behind others[NewLine] In the end, the end will be miserable

Layla, Layla[NewLine] You have to believe in yourself[NewLine] You also have to believe in the person who has helped you so much[NewLine] You can solve any problem together! [NewLine] Huh... well, I put all worries behind me [NewLine] Let's go!
...Why are reports and papers never finished? [NewLine] Why? (⊙Д⊙)

Hmm [NewLine] I don't want to stay up all night to make up the progress of the project [NewLine] But who told her that there are always so many things that can't be done [NewLine] No way [NewLine] Of course I have to help her [NewLine]...you Want to come with me? (*￣︶￣)

+20% [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka, every time you complete a technology or get a Eureka, you will accumulate stress value, and each point of stress value will be -5% [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka, after the stress value reaches 5, when you rest, you will There will be a second personality to complete the current technology and clear the pressure value for you immediately [NewLine] You can enjoy double canned knowledge
A student of Rita Vandhi Academy specializing in theoretical astrology. Often sleepwalking, long-term lack of sleep, suffering from sleep problems. [NewLine] "Me? Of course I'm sleepwalking~"
